summary: Build a single full-screen romantic Valentine web page (pink/white) using React + TypeScript + Tailwind for Caffeine.ai, featuring a Yes button and a No button that dodges on hover; clicking Yes shows a cute couple-cat image with the message “Good choice.”
architectural_notes: Target stack is Caffeine.ai using React + TypeScript + Tailwind (not raw HTML/CSS/JS).
Single-page, full-screen layout with no navigation.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cute couple cats illustration in a romantic style (couple-cats.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single full-screen Valentine page (no navigation) with a romantic pink-and-white theme, asking the user to be the creator’s Valentine and presenting two options: “Yes” and “No”.
Implement the “No” button to evade interaction: when the pointer hovers over (or touches) the “No” button, it moves to a different location so it cannot be clicked.
When the user clicks “Yes”, replace the question UI with a success view that shows the text “Good choice” and displays a cute couple-cat image.
Add the required generated image(s) as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them directly from the frontend (do not proxy through the backend).
